hero.title: Welcome to Innovate QA Conference 2026
hero.subtitle: Join industry leaders, pioneers, and visionaries sharing insights, best practices, and cutting-edge tools to build high-quality, safe, accessible, and reliable systems.

features.title: Community & Connection
features.description: We bring together QA professionals, engineering leaders, and innovators to share knowledge, build networks, and support one another in advancing the discipline of quality.

features.title: Learning & Growth
features.description: Through conferences, workshops, and meetups, we provide hands-on learning opportunities focused on modern testing practices, AI in QA, and practical strategies to elevate your skills and career.

features.title: Shaping the Future of Quality
features.description: We help teams and leaders embrace transformation—integrating AI, automation, and lean testing approaches to build high-confidence release pipelines.

features.title: AI-Powered Testing
features.description: Discover how artificial intelligence is revolutionizing test automation, defect prediction, and quality analytics to accelerate your delivery pipeline.

features.title: Engineering Excellence
features.description: Learn from practitioners who build quality into every stage of the development process, from code reviews to production monitoring.

features.title: Industry Networking
features.description: Connect with peers from leading tech companies, share experiences, and build relationships that advance your career.

features.title: Hands-On Workshops
features.description: Participate in practical sessions where you'll learn new tools, techniques, and frameworks you can apply immediately.

features.title: Career Advancement
features.description: Gain insights from industry leaders on how to grow your career, lead teams, and make an impact in quality engineering.

venue.name: The Westin Bellevue
venue.description: Join us at The Westin Bellevue in downtown Bellevue, Washington.

features.text: Downtown Bellevue, accessible from I-405 and I-90

gold.name: The Stories and Wisdom Company
gold.logo: The Stories and Wisdom Company_Dark text.png

featured.name: Ronit Bohrer Hillel
featured.title: Engineering Leader, Business & Industry Frontline Applications
featured.topic: Becoming AI‑First?! What Does that Means for QA?
featured.bio: Ronit Bohrer Hillel is an Engineering Leader at Microsoft and a seasoned product-engineering leader with a proven track record of delivering innovative solutions and enterprise-scale products. With over 20 years of diverse experience, she has successfully led Engineering, QA, Product, and Science teams across various domains, including SaaS, AI, no-code, Retail, Telecom, and Big data. Ronit is a former VP of Engineering at Smartsheet and an Engineering Leader at Amazon. She has held engineering leadership roles in enterprises, mid-sized companies, and startups. She holds a BS in Computer Science and an MBA. Ronit is a career coach, a board member and a speaker.

featured.name: Sidharth Shukla
featured.title: SDET 2
featured.topic: From Failure to Fix: AI-Driven Test Debugging & RCA with Playwright MCP and LLM CLI
featured.bio: Speaker | Automation Expert | AI & LLMs in Testing | Mentor, Sidharth is a seasoned Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) with over 14 years of experience in automation, specializing in Playwright, Selenium, Appium, API testing, and AI-driven test automation. As a thought leader in the testing community, he has trained 5,000+ professionals worldwide and actively mentors aspiring QA engineers. He is at the forefront of AI & LLMs in Software Testing, leading initiatives at Amazon and collaborating with teams to automate test case generation using LLMs. His contributions have significantly improved test automation efficiency, reducing manual effort by up to 50% in multiple projects. Sidharth is a frequent speaker at global conferences, including Automation Guild 2025, and has presented across the USA, Canada, and India. His insights on modern test automation, Playwright adoption, and AI-driven quality engineering have made a lasting impact in the industry. Beyond speaking engagements, Sidharth runs a highly followed LinkedIn newsletter (50K+ subscribers) and was recently featured on a Times Square billboard for his outstanding mentorship to the QA community. Connect with him to explore the future of test automation, AI in testing, and best practices in QA engineering!

featured.name: Dr. Bastian Baudisch
featured.title: Lead Sales Engineer US
featured.topic: AI Generated Test Data: Know Your Need
featured.bio: Bastian is a data management and process automation specialist with a multifaceted background in technical sales and consulting in finance, insurance, retail and pharma. With previous leadership roles in data science and software QA, Bastian has honed a pragmatic, holistic approach to solving complex data challenges. Bastian’s passion lies in bridging technological innovation with practical, user-centric solutions, ensuring that test environments are as robust and agile as the challenges they face. In his current role as Lead Sales Engineer US at UBS HAINER, he drives the adoption of the XDM Data Orchestration Platform — enabling enterprise software engineers, testers, and machine learning teams to access production-grade, real-world data on demand.

featured.name: Krishna Seerapu
featured.title: CEO
featured.topic: Is Today’s Test Infra Ready for AI? The Hard Questions No One Is Asking.
featured.bio: Krishna Seerapu is a seasoned technology executive, engineering leader, and the Founder & CEO of FlintLab Inc., bringing nearly 25 years of experience building large-scale developer platforms, cloud infrastructure, and enterprise-grade automation systems. Across leadership roles at Google, Amazon, Microsoft, RSA (EMC Security), Progress Software, and Motorola, he has led globally distributed engineering teams delivering mission-critical platforms spanning cloud ecosystems, security engineering, IoT, e-commerce, and distributed test infrastructure. At FlintLab, Krishna is pioneering AI-native quality engineering by building intelligent, next-generation test infrastructure and engineering productivity platforms tailored for modern AI-driven software systems. He is widely recognized for driving large-scale engineering transformations that accelerate release velocity, strengthen automation reliability, and enhance platform scalability. His leadership philosophy combines deep technical rigor with operational discipline, enabling enterprises to modernize quality engineering practices while upholding the highest standards of reliability, security, and customer trust.

featured.name: Amber Race
featured.title: Staff SDE
featured.topic: Beyond Page Objects: Modern Patterns for Scaling Playwright Tests
featured.bio: Amber Race has over 25 years of testing experience at Microsoft, Big Fish Games, and Adobe, doing everything from data wrangling to tools development to writing automation frameworks for web services and applications. She currently specializes in test automation tooling and support for large web application platforms. Amber lives in Seattle, WA, where you can find her cheering on the local sports teams with her family or belting out Guns and Roses at a dive karaoke bar.

featured.name: Walter Zimerman
featured.title: Sr SDE
featured.topic: Scaling Trust, Not Automation - Rethinking Quality for the AI Era
featured.bio: Walter Ariel Zimerman has spent 17 years on test automation, building frameworks that run millions of test cases every month. He has designed end-to-end solutions across tourism, manufacturing, regulatory compliance, accounting & finance, and voice-assistant platforms. Walter has held senior roles as Quality Assurance Engineer, Software Developer in Test, and QA Manager, and hosted the largest QA meetup in Dublin, Ireland, growing it to 2,000+ members, 40+ events, and an international conference. Passionate about computer science, Walter is a test driven development / design practitioner and evangelist. His current obsession: architecting scalable, developer-friendly APIs. In his spare time, you’ll find him lifting weights, running, playing the guitar, playing board games, or debating tech over a pint—preferably with heavy-metal blasting in the background.

featured.name: Lee Barnes
featured.title: Chief Quality Officer
featured.topic: Taming the Beast: Testing Non-Deterministic AI Systems with Confidence
featured.bio: Lee has over 30 years of experience in the Software Quality Engineering field. He has been involved in the implementation of innovative QE solutions in hundreds of environments across a wide array of industries. Most recently, Lee has been involved with bringing AI-augmented quality practices to software engineering teams. Lee speaks regularly at industry conferences including Innovate QA, StarEAST/WEST, DevOpsDays, Agile+DevOps East/West, QA or the Highway, and TestCon Europe.

eventLD.name: Innovate QA 2026
eventLD.description: Join industry leaders and pioneers at Innovate QA Conference 2026 in Seattle. Share insights, best practices, and cutting-edge tools for quality engineering excellence.
